name: ATI Radeon Video Driver Support File

description: ATI launched Radeon video cards in 2000 to be their consumer 3D accelerator add-in cards. The Radeon line of products was ATI's premiere offering, directly competing with Nvidia's GeForce.

Since AMD acquired ATI in 2006, it has deprecated the HLX format, making HLX files obscure. When in use, HLX files worked with other driver files to optimize the functionality of the Radeon video card.
